trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Novato
There were no other sightings in Novato on or around August 26th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi live in a section of novato, ca. which is on landing approaches to 4 different air ports + 1 military base. i've been here in this location since 1984, so i am well aware of the flight routes around here. at 20:56 - 21:02 i spotted a light coming out of the west \ it seemed to be at about the same height as a b-52 ( over 10,000 ft.) size was bigger that a b-52 \ was cigar shaped and the whole craft was glowing white with some slight roiling to the plasma. i ran to get my camera, but battery dead. i saw a similar thing 2 years earlier, but without binoculars. this thing did not have any conventional navigation lights. i can send sketch later
Summary: I saw a very bright light coming out of the west / I ran in to get my binocs / saw cigar shaped object over 10,000ft. which was totally aglow
